Class ViewGameSquare

java.lang.Object
graphics.ViewGameSquare
public final class ViewGameSquare extends Object
ViewGameSquare contains the functions necessary to print and draw for the graphic version of Cascadia square

      drawPlayer draws the board of a player
      Parameters:
      context - ApplicationContext representing the application being run
      playerBoard - Map representing the board of a player
      marge - int representing the size of the rectangle for a tile
      widthScreen - int representing the width of the screen
      heightScreen - int representing the height of the screen

    • menu

      public static int menu(com.github.forax.zen.ApplicationContext context, int widthScreenInfo, int heightScreenInfo)

      widthScreenInfo - int representing the width of the screen

    • drawHead

      public static int drawHead(com.github.forax.zen.ApplicationContext context, int widthScreenInfo, int heightScreenInfo, Map<Coordinate,TileSquare> player, AnimalCard card, DrawSquare draw, int currentPlayer, int marge)
      drawHead draws the necessary for a player to play his turn
      Parameters:
      context - ApplicationContext representing the application being run
      widthScreenInfo - int representing the width of the screen
      heightScreenInfo - int representing the height of the screen
      player - Map representing the player board
      card - AnimalCard representing the current card being used
      draw - DrawSquare representing the draw
      currentPlayer - int representing the current player
      marge - int representing the size of a cell
      Returns:
      int representing the player's choice

      heightScreen - int representing the height of the screen
